meanings.definition: Freebasers: people who engage in the practice of freebasing drugs.
meanings.sent1: The freebasers gathered in the alley to freebase drugs.
meanings.sent2: She learned about the dangers of freebasers in health class.
meanings.sent3: The freebasers accidentally mixed up their drug supplies and had a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The freebasers' addiction was like a dark cloud hanging over their lives.
meanings.sent5: The news report highlighted the risks associated with freebasers.

meanings.definition: Freebasers: the act of freebasing drugs.
meanings.sent1: Freebasers can be harmful to themselves due to the nature of the practice.
meanings.sent2: The police were on high alert for any signs of freebasers in the area.
meanings.sent3: The freebasers' party was a wild and crazy event.
meanings.sent4: The freebasers' actions were like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the world of freebasers and its consequences.
